xwikidoc.content: <khodeir> has joined #phenotips 02:18 <roque> has quit 02:22 <khodeir> has quit 03:22 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 03:28 <sdumitriu> has quit 03:29 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 09:01 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 10:12 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 10:12 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu: 10:12 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey 10:12 <kushalkhandelwal> Good morning 10:31 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 10:32 <sdumitriu1> kushalkhandelwal: https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/issues/424 10:32 <sdumitriu1> brb 10:36 <kushalkhandelwal> I was looking at some issues in morning 10:36 <kushalkhandelwal> https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/issues/431 10:36 <kushalkhandelwal> This one 10:37 <kushalkhandelwal> I have to change imagedisplayer.xml CSS 10:37 <kushalkhandelwal> attachment-preview ? 10:37 <kushalkhandelwal> https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/issues/432 10:37 <kushalkhandelwal> I could find the file 10:37 <kushalkhandelwal> but what is the change in the API 10:40 <kushalkhandelwal> For the bug 424 10:40 <kushalkhandelwal> I have to change the token in dbwebhomesheet 10:40 <kushalkhandelwal> ? 10:40 <kushalkhandelwal> services.csrf.getToke 10:40 <kushalkhandelwal> ? 10:53 <sdumitriu1> Back 10:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Hm 11:01 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: 11:02 <kushalkhandelwal> Read the above I posted 11:02 <sdumitriu1> Reading 11:02 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 11:03 <sdumitriu1> #431: Yes, the CSS in ImageDisplayer 11:04 <kushalkhandelwal> So changing width to 60px should do 11:04 <sdumitriu1> No 11:04 <sdumitriu1> That rule is correct 11:05 <sdumitriu1> But it is overridden by another rule in PatientSheetCode 11:05 <sdumitriu1> You're using Firebug? 11:05 <kushalkhandelwal> Not firebug 11:05 <kushalkhandelwal> I was using the existing one 11:05 <kushalkhandelwal> Wait would install firebug 11:06 <sdumitriu1> Ah, the existing one should be good, too 11:06 <ravigarg27> has joined #phenotips 11:07 <sdumitriu1> I forgot to adapt to the new tools, a few years ago Firebug was the only option 11:07 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 11:07 <kushalkhandelwal> Earlier i used that 11:07 <sdumitriu1> Some more years ago DOMInspector was the only option... 11:07 <kushalkhandelwal> Firebug is good 11:07 <kushalkhandelwal> better than the existing 11:07 <kushalkhandelwal> one 11:07 <kushalkhandelwal> The one with chrome is better than firefox one 11:08 <kushalkhandelwal> Why in the CSS 11:08 <kushalkhandelwal> Too much use of IMPORTANT 11:08 <kushalkhandelwal> Not a good practice 11:08 <sdumitriu1> I know 11:08 <kushalkhandelwal> it gets hard to debug then 11:11 <kushalkhandelwal> Are you sure overwritten by something in patientsheecode ? 11:11 <sdumitriu1> Yes 11:12 <kushalkhandelwal> Waiting for firebug to download :\ 11:13 <kushalkhandelwal> See if i change in imagedisplayer 11:13 <kushalkhandelwal> and put height as 60px 11:13 <kushalkhandelwal> it should work 11:14 <sdumitriu1> But in view mode it should be bigger 11:14 <sdumitriu1> Be careful not to remove that feature 11:16 <kushalkhandelwal> Ohh I didn't check view mode 11:16 <kushalkhandelwal> was looking in edit only 11:16 <ravigarg27> has quit 11:17 <kushalkhandelwal> It should work over there 11:18 <kushalkhandelwal> in view its taking from patientsheetcode 11:19 <kushalkhandelwal> Or we can just change the max width 11:19 <kushalkhandelwal> to something 80px 11:19 <kushalkhandelwal> instead of 100 11:23 <krinye> has quit 11:24 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: ? 11:24 <sdumitriu1> Did you try it? 11:25 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 11:25 <kushalkhandelwal> putting 80 would work 11:27 <kushalkhandelwal> Wait let me try again .. some problem with my ff 11:50 <kushalk124> has joined #phenotips 11:53 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 12:31 <khodeir> has joined #phenotips 12:37 <khodeir> has quit 12:38 <khodeir> has joined #phenotips 12:47 <khodeir> has quit 13:24 <froggy> has quit 13:37 <roque> has quit 13:41 <kushalk124> velocity call 13:41 <kushalk124> for $services.csrf 13:45 <kushalk124> sdumitriu1 Help a bit 13:46 <kushalk124> sdumitriu1: Where is the velocity call to services.csrf 13:47 <sdumitriu1> has quit 13:48 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 13:54 <kushalk124> marta sdumitriu1 Publication ! Congrats :) 13:55 <kushalk124> is now known as <kushalkhandelwal> 13:55 <sdumitriu1> Thanks 13:56 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: Help 13:56 <kushalkhandelwal> so where it is being called in velocity 13:56 <sdumitriu1> I don't understand 13:57 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 13:58 <kushalkhandelwal> In the JS, instead of using the velocity call to $services.csrf, get the value from that meta tag 13:58 <kushalkhandelwal> velocity call 14:03 <sdumitriu1> has quit 14:04 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 14:05 <sdumitriu1> kushalkhandelwal: NetSplit 14:05 <sdumitriu1> https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/blob/master/components/patient-data/ui/src/main/resources/PhenoTips/PatientSheetCode.xml#L139 14:17 <froggy> has quit 14:19 <sdumitriu1> kushalkhandelwal: There? 14:34 <BogdanVancea> has quit 14:51 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 14:51 <kushalkhandelwal> sorry was out 14:58 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: 14:58 <sdumitriu1> Yes? 14:59 <kushalkhandelwal> netsplit ? 15:00 <sdumitriu1> Yeah, I got kicked out of the chat 15:04 <kushalkhandelwal> Hm 15:04 <kushalkhandelwal> I can see it call for token 15:06 <kushalkhandelwal> Would work on this tomorrow 15:06 <kushalkhandelwal> Very sleepy :( 15:06 <kushalkhandelwal> Woke up early today 15:06 <sdumitriu1> OK 15:06 <sdumitriu1> No problem 15:06 <kushalkhandelwal> Microprocessors :( 15:06 <kushalkhandelwal> I had to study today ! :( 15:06 <sdumitriu1> Exams? 15:07 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 15:12 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: 15:12 <sdumitriu1> Yes? 15:13 <kushalkhandelwal> I just have to replace this 15:13 <kushalkhandelwal> $!{services.csrf.getToken()} 15:13 <kushalkhandelwal> ? 15:13 <kushalkhandelwal> in that line 15:13 <kushalkhandelwal> get value from meta tag ? 15:13 <sdumitriu1> Yes 15:18 <kushalkhandelwal> so can use something like 15:18 <kushalkhandelwal> getelementsbyname 15:18 <kushalkhandelwal> or something 15:18 <sdumitriu1> There's $$ from Protype 15:18 <sdumitriu1> prototype 15:18 <kushalkhandelwal> $$('meta[name=form_token]')[0].content; 15:18 <kushalkhandelwal> ? 15:19 <sdumitriu1> Yep 15:19 <kushalkhandelwal> can use this 15:19 <kushalkhandelwal> ? 15:19 <sdumitriu1> Yes 15:19 <kushalkhandelwal> so replacing $!{services.csrf.getToken() with $$('meta[name=form_token]')[0].content; 15:19 <kushalkhandelwal> ? 15:23 <kushalkhandelwal> form_token=" + $$('meta[name=form_token]')[0].content + (Prototype.Browser.Opera ? "" : "&ajax=1"); 15:24 <kushalkhandelwal> This would be correct ? 15:24 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: 15:24 <sdumitriu1> Yes 15:25 <kushalkhandelwal> This is ok ? 15:25 <kushalkhandelwal> very sleepy cant figure it out :P 15:29 <kushalkhandelwal> I opened PR 15:29 <kushalkhandelwal> Check once 15:29 <kushalkhandelwal> then would sleep 15:29 <sdumitriu1> Checking 15:30 <kushalkhandelwal> Tomorrow #428 and #429 15:31 <kushalkhandelwal> Why it says 2 commits 15:31 <sdumitriu1> The second one is the merge itself 15:31 <sdumitriu1> I'm running out of easy issues again... 15:31 <kushalkhandelwal> :P 15:31 <kushalkhandelwal> #428 and #429 15:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Tell me about them 15:32 <kushalkhandelwal> would do them 15:32 <kushalkhandelwal> tomorrow when I take a break from micro :P 15:32 <sdumitriu1> Hm, leave them for somebody else 15:32 <kushalkhandelwal> We will find more , dont worry 15:32 <sdumitriu1> You should report some 15:32 <kushalkhandelwal> So you happy today ? 15:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Ohh :( 15:32 <kushalkhandelwal> You got someone else to fix bugs :D 15:32 <sdumitriu1> Did you notice anything unusal when using PhenoTips? 15:33 <kushalkhandelwal> I will try to find bugs 15:33 <kushalkhandelwal> there were things I noticed 15:33 <kushalkhandelwal> I told u about password recovery 15:33 <kushalkhandelwal> There a few things 15:33 <kushalkhandelwal> would go through it again and then report bugs 15:34 <sdumitriu1> These two issues are getting too easy for you 15:34 <kushalkhandelwal> Today a lot many people online on IRC 15:34 <sdumitriu1> #421 is a bit more advanced, it's not a one-liner 15:34 <sdumitriu1> Yeah, Friday is getting close, you'll see then activity 15:35 <kushalkhandelwal> Ohh 15:35 <kushalkhandelwal> Many proposals ? 15:35 <kushalkhandelwal> #421 Would try 15:35 <kushalkhandelwal> Some explanation on that would help 15:35 <sdumitriu1> The number of proposals tends to grow exponentially 15:36 <kushalkhandelwal> I dont understand 15:36 <kushalkhandelwal> How come people put proposals without being active anywhere 15:36 <kushalkhandelwal> Because this a university org 15:36 <kushalkhandelwal> Do students come and meet you there ? 15:37 <sdumitriu1> http://rtemsramblings.blogspot.ca/2012/04/rtems-gsoc-applications-for-2012.html 15:37 <sdumitriu1> Yes, we've had a few come to the lab 15:37 <kushalkhandelwal> Hm 15:37 <kushalkhandelwal> That's what I thought 15:38 <kushalkhandelwal> Without discussing on idea how can you make your application 15:38 <sdumitriu1> Yeah, that happens way too often 15:38 <kushalkhandelwal> Growth in applications 15:39 <kushalkhandelwal> Another 48hrs 15:39 <sdumitriu1> At XWiki, each year most of the applications came from people that didn't ineract with the community at all 15:39 <sdumitriu1> They rarely get accepted 15:40 <sdumitriu1> Well, not everybody has time to read the rules 15:41 <kushalkhandelwal> Clearly 15:41 <kushalkhandelwal> Cut-Copy-Paste applications 15:41 <kushalkhandelwal> It took me time to make the application 15:41 <kushalkhandelwal> inputs from you 15:41 <kushalkhandelwal> then was able to make one 15:41 <kushalkhandelwal> without interaction I don't think I could have made it 15:41 <kushalkhandelwal> Its hard to understand the Goal itself 15:42 <kushalkhandelwal> Before making application , getting yourself aligned to the organizaions goal is important 15:45 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok , I talk a lot :P 15:45 <kushalkhandelwal> Time to sleep 15:45 <kushalkhandelwal> Good Night 15:45 <kushalkhandelwal> Catch you tomorrow 15:45 <sdumitriu1> Good night 15:45 <kushalkhandelwal> And post a little bit more info on #421 15:46 <kushalkhandelwal> so that I can try it 15:46 <kushalkhandelwal> Thanks good night :) 15:55 <roque>
